sn35.19:1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, cakkhuṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn35.19:1.2: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35.19:1.5: yo jivhaṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn35.19:1.6: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35.19:1.8: yo manaṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn35.19:1.9: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35.19:2.1: “Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhuṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn35.19:2.2: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35.19:2.5: yo jivhaṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn35.19:2.6: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35.19:2.8: yo manaṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn35.19:2.9: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
